page.title: 09MIDLAND SCHOOL BANK
page.content: Each Wednesday in the school hall the children operate the school bank which started on the 23rd October 1985. On that day 31 new accounts were opened in the name of the Midland Bank. The school is recognised as a bank in the meaning of the Banking Act 1979.Each week the children can deposit or withdraw their money and all transactions are completed by the school bank staff which consists of 1 manager, 2 cashiers and 1 ledger clerk, all of which are children.The staff change every 4 weeks which gives all the senior children a chance to operate as bank staff. After each opening the money is safely taken to the Tiverton Branch where all the childrens accounts are held .
